name: AIA_UTIL_GetStartAndEndDateOfMonth
description: Rule to get the start and end date of a month
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!month:month(today())-ri!monthsAgo,
  local!endOfMonthDay:if(
    ri!tillPresentDay,
    today(),
    eomonth(today(),-ri!monthsAgo)
  ),
  {
    userdatetime(
      year(today()),
      local!month,
      1,
      0,
      1
    ),
    userdatetime(
      year(today()),
      local!month,
      day(local!endOfMonthDay),
      23,
      59
    )
  }
)
